meta.title: OFF
meta.description: A blog about tech and life

css: :root{font-size:max(1vw, min(1.5vh, 2.5vw));--c-bg:#fff;--c-bg-blur:#fffa;--c-bg-zero:#fff0;--c-text:#000;--c-text-accent:#6a7282;}body{font-family:'Mona Sans', serif;margin:0;padding:4rem;min-width:320px;max-width:100vw;min-height:calc(100vh - 8rem);display:flex;flex-direction:column;background:var(--c-bg);}header{position:sticky;top:4rem;text-align:left;z-index:50;}header nav{display:flex;flex-direction:column;text-align:right;align-items:end;background:#fff0;position:absolute;right:0;border-radius:0.5rem;z-index:50;top:-0.4rem;backdrop-filter:blur(0.5em);transition:0.2s ease-out;}header nav:hover,header nav:focus,header nav:focus-within,header nav:has(a:hover){background:#fffa;}header nav::before{content:'≡';font-size:5.15rem;line-height:0.15;height:2rem;display:block;width:2.8rem;padding:0.1em;}header nav a{font-size:0;padding:0.5em 0.4em 0.5em 2em;font-family:'Inter Tight', sans-serif;transition:0.2s ease-out;}header nav:hover a,header nav:focus a,header nav:active a,header nav:focus-within a{font-size:2rem;}header nav a:last-child{padding-bottom:2em;}header nav a:hover{color:var(--c-text-accent);}.logo{font-size:2rem;text-decoration:none;color:var(--c-text-accent);font-family:'Inter Tight', sans-serif;}.logo:hover{text-decoration:underline;}.logo b{color:#000;text-transform:uppercase;}.logo:after{content:'';position:absolute;width:100%;height:1px;background:#0002;left:0;top:1.5em;}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-family:'Inter Tight', sans-serif;}main{flex-grow:1;}._1b h1{text-align:left;font-size:7.5rem;line-height:1;width:80vw;margin:7rem 0;}._1b h1 em{font-style:normal;display:block;color:var(--c-text-accent);}._1b h1+p{font-size:2rem;line-height:1.3;text-align:right;width:50vw;margin:0 0 0 auto;position:relative;}._1b h1+p:before{content:'';position:absolute;width:calc(100% - 8rem);height:1px;background:#0002;left:calc(-100% + 8rem);top:1.5em;}h2{font-size:3rem;}section:not(:first-of-type){display:flex;margin:10rem 0;position:relative;}section>div{margin:4rem 0;flex:1;}section>img{aspect-ratio:3 / 1;width:40%;object-fit:cover;border-radius:0.5rem;}.abs+img{width:100%;height:100%;z-index:-1;aspect-ratio:auto;position:absolute;}section>div:first-child,section>img:first-child{margin-right:4rem;}.quote{font-size:2.5rem;margin:10rem 20vw;}.quote::before,.quote::after{content:'“';color:#0009;position:absolute;transform:translate(-100%, -15%);font-family:'Inter Tight', sans-serif;font-size:1.5em;}.quote::after{content:'”';transform:translate(10%, -10%);}p{font-size:1.5rem;line-height:1.4;}nav a{text-decoration:none;display:inline-block;color:var(--c-text);}a:hover{color:var(--c-text-accent);}footer{display:flex;align-items:end;justify-content:space-between;}h6{font-size:8rem;text-transform:uppercase;margin:0;overflow:hidden;height:8rem;}footer nav{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:0.4em 3em;font-size:1.5rem;flex-wrap:wrap;height:7rem;justify-content:flex-end;text-align:left;}@media (max-width:640px){._1b h1{font-size:5.5rem;}section>div:first-child,section>img:first-child{margin-right:2rem;}section>div{margin:2rem 0;}.quote{margin:10rem 10vw;}p{font-size:2rem;}}

pages.title: Dare to Move
pages.content:
Creative experinces with emphasison customer value

Life is too short for the mundane. Adventure is calling, and it’s time to answer. Whether you’re sailing across azure waters, hiking through breathtaking landscapes, or skiing down pristine slopes, every moment spent outdoors is a chance to discover something new.

Sail the Open Seas

Feel the wind in your hair as you navigate the waves. Sailing isn’t just about the destination; it’s about the journey. Experience the thrill of the ocean while staying grounded.

Hike to New Heights

Lace up your boots and hit the trails. Hiking offers a unique blend of challenge and tranquility. Conquer peaks, breathe in fresh air, and let nature inspire you. Every step is a step towards a better you.

Sometimes, you have to shake off the fear that holds you back and venture into uncharted territory. True strength lies in your ability to push past comfort and discover what you're truly capable of. Embrace the discomfort; it's where the magic happens.

Ski with a View

Elevate your winter experience. Helicopter skiing takes you to untouched powder, where the only tracks are yours. Glide down slopes that promise excitement without the chaos.

Safari Game Drives

Get up close with nature. Safari game drives offer a glimpse into the wild, all from the safety of your vehicle. Witness majestic creatures in their natural habitat and feel the pulse of the earth beneath you.

The moment you step off the familiar path, you open the door to new possibilities. Growth happens when you challenge yourself to leave behind what feels safe and embrace the unknown. Don't be afraid to take that leap.

Why Wait?

Dare to move ! Adventure is not just for the bold; it’s for everyone willing to step outside their comfort zone. Challenge yourself, inspire others, and make every moment count.

Take Off!

Your next adventure is just a decision away. Go! Embrace the thrill of exploration and let the world be your playground.
